The 'Tampa Bay Lightning' are a professional ice hockey team based in Tampa,
Florida. They are members of the Atlantic Division of the Eastern Conference of
the National Hockey League (NHL). They have one Stanley Cup championship in
their history, in 2003–04. [http://sports.espn.go.com/nhl/recap/_/id/240607020/calgary-
flames-vs-tampa-bay-lightning Fedotenko scores both Tampa goals] They are
often referred to as the 'Bolts', and the nickname is used on their current
third jersey. They play their home games in the Tampa Bay Times Forum in Tampa.
